column2:
"It seems like when called
by your name, you get all crazy. You don't think so?"

"If you're sure you're fine then I guess it's okay.
But how do you expect me to live with myself if you
blow this mission because I used your real name? "

"So make sure you nail this one like the
less-than-losery ARKS op I know you are!"

"どうも名前で呼んでると
調子が狂うなあ。そんなことない？"

"大丈夫ならいいんだけど
調子が狂ってクエストに失敗したら
私が責任感じちゃうじゃない。"

"私が認めた一人前のアークスらしく
カッコいいとこ見せてよね！"
